content: beginner-friendly introduction to tunisian crochet try the cat nap blanket made with yarnspirations new o go yarn find the free pattern on my blog ** here 1 ** **features** -tunisian simple stitch panels worked with the join as you go method tutorial video available -simple double_crochet border to help manage curling -decorative twisted tassels to use up extra yarn and give a playful flair **materials** -5 o go bernat blanket in milk & honey -10mm tunisian crochet hook -scissors -tapestry needle 1 https //tlycblog com/new-ogo-yarn-yarn-review-free-crochet-blanket-pattern/
